name: TimelyTilesHP11- Carousel Banner - Nav arrows - Hover over state
id: stories/OCOM_HP/TimelyTilesHP11.story;TimelyTilesHP11- Carousel Banner - Nav arrows - Hover over state

testSteps.description: Given User on the home page
When User hovers over left nav arrows
Then User see the background of the arrow must turn gray
Then User hovers over right nav arrows also
Then User see the background of the arrow must turn Gray

userStory.narrative:
In order to communicate effectively to the business some functionality
As a development team
I want to use Behaviour-Driven Development
